Summary: saw triangle craft. Its called "the raven".
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Alamogordo
There were no other sightings in Alamogordo on or around November 15th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWas on state hwy 54 headed south. Saw a Black Triangle at about 700 ft altitude flying northwest towards Holloman AFB. I could not tell its exact size but I believe its around the size of a fighter jet. I told several friends about this, one of which knows several Airmen. The airman said it was not a UFO but the replacement for the F-117. They call it "the raven". Now we know. Those arent ufo's, they are America's latest stealth birds.
